1.0.name: wordpress/page-comments-off-please
1.0.description: Page Comments Off Please - Unchecks Discussion comment checkboxes by default on pages, posts or both! Plus a simple one-click toggle to turn off comments on existing pages too! This plugin lets you manage page comment / discussion checkboxes with ease!

2.0.name: wordpress/page-comments-off-please
2.0.description: Page Comments Off Please - Unchecks Discussion comment checkboxes by default on pages, posts or both! Plus a simple one-click toggle to turn off comments on existing pages too! This plugin lets you manage page comment / discussion checkboxes with ease!
